Uses of Class
models.Projectile

  • Packages that use Projectile 
    Package Description
    models  

    • Uses of Projectile in models

      Subclasses of Projectile in models 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  AoEExplodeProjectile
      Projectile decorator which causes all enemies near the target to take damage.
      class  PlainProjectile
      The base projectile object for the decorator design pattern.
      class  ProjectileDecorator
      Concrete class for the projectile decorator design pattern.
      class  SlowingProjectile
      Decorator for the projectile which causes enemies to be slowed.
      Methods in models that return Projectile 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Projectile PlainProjectile.clone​()
      Returns a copy of this projectile for the prototype design pattern.
      abstract Projectile Projectile.clone​()
      Returns a copy of the projectile
      Projectile ProjectileDecorator.getProjectile​()
      Returns the base projectile.
      Projectile Tower.getProjectile​()
      Returns the projectile used by this tower.
      Methods in models that return types with arguments of type Projectile 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.util.ArrayList<Projectile> Tower.getProjectiles​()
      Returns the list of all active projectiles originating from this tower.
      Methods in models with parameters of type Projectile 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void ProjectileDecorator.setProjectile​(Projectile projectile)
      Sets the base projectile.
      void Tower.setProjectile​(Projectile projectile)
      Set the projectile used by this tower.
      Constructors in models with parameters of type Projectile 
      Constructor Description
      AoEExplodeProjectile​(Projectile baseProjectile, java.util.List<Enemy> enemies)
      Create new decorator which causes AoE explosions.
      ProjectileDecorator​(Projectile projectile)
      Create concrete class for the decorator design pattern applied to the projectiles.
      SlowingProjectile​(Projectile projectile)
      Create projectile decorator which applies a slow to enemies.
